items.name: MEN Comfort Jacket
items.shortDescription: Looks neat like a jacket, but feels soft and can be thrown on comfortably. Also easy to care for.

items.composition: Face: 100% Polyamide/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ [Shoulder] Inner Layer: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ [Shoulder] Outer Layer: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Polyamide
items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Resin-coated shell interior.
- Distinctive crisp feel and matte finish.
- Glossy lining. Grosgrain tape adds a design accent to the pockets.
- Elastic shirring inside the cuffs and the back hem for a perfectly fitted feel.
items.name: MEN Light Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: Stylish design with a sleek fitted hem and contrasting fabric.

items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Melton wool blend. Contoured regular-fit cut.
items.name: MEN Wool Blended Chesterfield Coat
items.shortDescription: An essential coat with a substantial feel and a flattering cut. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.composition: Body: 100% Wool/ Trim: 100% Cotton/ Tape: 100% Acrylic
items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- A sophisticated classic coat that combines substantial and style.
- Side slits allow for easy movement.
- Contoured form for a quintessential +J style.
items.name: MEN Wool Oversized Duffle Coat
items.shortDescription: A sophisticated classic coat with excellent heat retention. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.
